title: Central Clearing and Liquidity
content: Typical Payments Chains Between CCP and Clearing Customers  CCP  Settlement Bank  Payment Bank  Clearing Member  Customer  Customer's Bank  Settlement Bank may provide  intraday credit to Clearing Member  Clearing Member may provide   credit to Customer  Customer's Bank may provide   credit to Customer
